content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at position(-28, -61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61) with coal fuel
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5) storing iron ore
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5) moving items from chest
- Stone furnace at (2, -56) producing iron plates

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at position(-27, -59)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59) producing copper plates
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5) for material movement
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5) for storage

### Production Line at position(1, 1)
Consists of following entities:
- Three stone furnaces at (1,1), (3,1), and (2,7)
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests for material movement and storage
- Connected by transport belts for material flow

### Assembly Complex at position(14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5) for copper cable production
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5) for electronic circuit production
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests for material handling
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Power Generation System (Incomplete)
Components placed but not fully connected:
- Boiler at (37.5, 19)
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)
- Offshore pumps at (-7.5, 25.5), (2.5, 34.5), and (2.5, 36.5)
- Multiple pipe groups attempting to connect water system

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with fluid connections
- When connecting entities with pipes, ensure you have the required pipes in your inventory
- Check that connection points between entities are not blocked by other structures
- Plan pipe layouts to have clear paths between connection points

### Entity placement and connection issues
- Verify that you have all required items in inventory before attempting connections
- Ensure connection points between entities (like boilers and pumps) have clear, unobstructed paths
- Consider the direction and orientation of entities when placing them for connections

### Power distribution issues
- Multiple entities are showing "not receiving electricity" warnings
- Ensure proper connection of power poles to create a complete electrical network
- Check that power generating equipment (steam engine) is properly connected to boilers and water supply
